Recipe.Title: Chicken Salad
Recipe.Instructions: Fry the chicken and peppers in olive oil. Stir in the chicken into yoghurt and then put seasonings. Take a plate and place them all together. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Club Sandwich
Recipe.Instructions: First toast the bread and then spread the mayonnaise on it. Fry the egg, in a fry pan with oil. Then chopped it in slices and put it on the bread. Put two slices of tomato on top of it. Put the next slice on top of it. Fried the chicken and cut it in to small pieces, mix with mayonnise and seasonings. Put it on the top with cheese. Put the bread on top then the toothpick. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Cheesy Potato Bake
Recipe.Instructions:
Thinly slice potato and add to saucepan of water. Boil until softened. Cube the onion and place it in the saucepan with the potato. Add the milk, cover saucepan and bring to the boil. Then drain. Butter an ovenproof dish and layer half of the potato. Sprinkle half of the onions on top then season. Sprinkle cheese on top.Add rest of the onion and cheese. Enjoy! 
Bake at 190c for 35mins or until crispy and golden. Enjoy!
